summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingThe Exuviance 3 in 1 Pore Clarifying Cleanser is formulated to remove makeup and breakout-triggering impurities, exfoliate pores and wash away oiliness and bacteria and target skin's natural pH balance. Ideal for oily and acne-prone skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsGentle enough for sensitive skinRemoves makeup, dirt and oilSoap-freeProtects the moisture balanceMinimizes the signs of agingKey IngredientsMandelic AcidItem 2627972How To UseApply to wet skin and gently massage to develop foaming action. Rinse thoroughly with water. Use twice daily.IngredientsAqua (Water) PEG-80 Sorbitan Laurate Glycerin Gluconolactone Ammonium Laureth Sulfate Triethanolamine Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate Mandelic Acid Salicylic acid Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5) Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil Sodium Laureth Sulfate Sodium Laureth-13 CarboxylatePEG-150 Distearate Cocamidopropyl Betaine Sodium Chloride PEG-150 Pentaerythrityl TetrastearatePPG-2 Hydroxyethyl CocamidePolyquaternium-10 PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil Polysorbate 20 BHT Benzalkonium Chloride Phenoxyethanol Chlorphenesin.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply to wet skin and gently massage to develop foaming action. Rinse thoroughly with water. Use twice daily.
ingredients: Aqua (Water) PEG-80 Sorbitan Laurate Glycerin Gluconolactone Ammonium Laureth Sulfate Triethanolamine Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate Mandelic Acid Salicylic acid Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5) Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil Sodium Laureth Sulfate Sodium Laureth-13 CarboxylatePEG-150 Distearate Cocamidopropyl Betaine Sodium Chloride PEG-150 Pentaerythrityl TetrastearatePPG-2 Hydroxyethyl CocamidePolyquaternium-10 PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil Polysorbate 20 BHT Benzalkonium Chloride Phenoxyethanol Chlorphenesin

reviews.headline: Refreshing
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review]   This clarifying water gel has a light texture. I use a little amount to apply on my face. It absorbs quickly and make my skin feeling fresh, brighter and hydrated. Don't forget to use a sunscreen before you go out.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I absolutely love this formula, it glides on nicely and my face feels baby soft in the morning. The packaging is sleek and I like the look of it. Will purchase when I run out!

reviews.headline: Works well
reviews.comments: I received this product in exchange for my honest review.  Exuviance 3 in 1 Pore Clarifying Cleanser works quite well.  I donot have a need for daily use but the item worked very well using when needed.  Its make you feel clean and does not over dry your skin.

reviews.headline: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review]
reviews.comments: I loved the product and will definitely be buying more

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Have been using this about two weeks now and love it. Pores have looked drastically smaller and seem to be holding on to less grossness. It doesn't dry out my skin or cause redness.

reviews.headline: Moisturize after using
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Packaging was minimalist and recyclable, which I love! I used it after showering and my mom also used it. After some time, I don't see some of my smaller pores. The larger pores might be smaller after extended use. Theres no noticeable smell and the gel feels light and non oily. I would consider using this for a facial routine during nighttime, as it suggests to be away from sunlight to prevent skin damage. Would recommend by my mom and I!

reviews.headline: Honest Review After a Few Days Using the Exuviance Pore Refi
reviews.comments:
I've been using this water gel for a few days now and I'm honestly impressed so far. I've been applying it mostly at night, and every morning my skin feels more balanced—especially in my T-zone, where I tend to get oily.

The texture is super lightweight and watery, absorbs quickly, and doesn't leave any sticky or greasy residue. I love that because I have combination skin and I'm always looking for something hydrating but oil-controlling.

It contains a blend of AHAs, PHAs, botanical extracts, and salicylic acid, so I feel like it's targeting both my pores and the occasional breakouts without irritating my skin. I've already noticed a slight improvement in some recent blemish marks and my skin's texture is starting to feel smoother.

reviews.headline: Best acne cleanser!!
reviews.comments: This cleanser is one of the only things that melts away my blackheads and helps keep my skin clear! My pores are so clean with this. I only use it at night, or every other night. I use their Gentle Cream Cleanser in the morning for extra hydration. When I do use the 3in1 I massage it in and leave it for a couple minutes and it works so well! I have combo/dry acne prone skin and this is perfect. No fragrance and doesn't irritate or dry my skin.

reviews.headline: Too strong for daily use
reviews.comments: I received a sample of this cleanser and thought I would give it a try. I have normal skin, generally not too oily or too dry. I used this cleanser twice a day for a couple of weeks and it left my skin very dry and shiny, with little breakouts all over my forehead - clear signs of over-exfoliation.  It was the only thing that I changed in my routine, so I am confident the cleanser was the culprit. I would not recommend this for use regularly.

reviews.headline: Lasts forever!
reviews.comments: I was hesitant but tried this and loved it so much!

reviews.headline: Inappropriate for my skin
reviews.comments:
Pretty sure that the young clerk who sold this to me didn't know that products for an 18 year-old's skin don't work for a 70 year-old.

Bottom line?  I should have looked at the product more carefully before buying.  And Ulta needs to train employees better.

Gotta return it as it stings.

reviews.headline: Too strong to be used as directed
reviews.comments: Definetly great for getting impurities off your face, but personally way too harsh for daily use. You'll need an intense moisturizer and serum to accompany this cleanser. I practically dried my skin to smithereens using it as directed. Using a gentler cleanser daily and this one once every other evening seems to be the spot for me. Sensitive skin types should be wary.

reviews.headline: Works!
reviews.comments: Myself and my daughter use this and it helps with cleaning our faces and has helped with breakouts!

reviews.headline: Aha was out of stock
reviews.comments:
I have normal/combination skin..
Some days i'm really oily… others.. its combination.
I like everything i've tried by exuviance.
The aha cleanser was out at my store, I picked this one instead.
It totally works fine.
I leave it in the shower. Husband has super dry skin and uses it on occasion. It doesn't overly dry his skin. He probably doesnt use it enough for it to. 
This did not break me out. 
It did not overly dry my skin.
It melts all makeup nicely.

reviews.headline: Too strong
reviews.comments:
I decided to try this 3 in 1 product since the Deep Clean AHA Cleanser was out of stock. 
The product was extremely strong for my combination skin. Returned.
